name: CATIA 3D Model
summary: Learn about .MODEL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Dassault Systemes CATIA (which stands for Computer-aided Three-dimensional Interactive Application) is an application that mechanical designers and engineers use to create and test tools, structures, machines, and machine components. CATIA is used in the aerospace, defense, architectural, and industrial machining industries, among others.
Versions 4 and below of CATIA save the 3D models users create as MODEL files. Version 5 saves users' models as PART files.

instructions: You can open a MODEL file in Dassault Systemes CATIA (Windows, Linux). If you want to convert a MODEL file to the PART file format used by CATIA version 5, first open the MODEL file in CATIA version 5. Then, copy and paste the file's contents into a blank PART file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
